column4: i have a problem with my sound card under ubuntu. could somebody help?
now i have a 5.1 sistem inserted.
and i have sound only in the center and front speakers
the sub and the rear have no sound
i've had this problem under suse 9.2 pro too
and still i had no succes in fixing it
i am a beginner in linux but this is the first problem i want to solve
so could you help?
what have you tried to fix it?
actually  i haven't tried anything because i don't know much. all i did was to check that the volume wasn't muted
wait. i have sound only in front speakers
no rear speaker and center and sub
OK... so you fired up the "volume control" and checked that it wasn't muted. Did it have separate sliders for the rear/sub?
no
does the volume control have an Edit>Preferences selection?
yes it does
try it. When I click on it, it gives me a checklist of controls to display. See whether rear/center are among them.
no. rear/center are missing
Darn. I saw one for center when I tried it. Must be a function of the drier.
er, driver. :)
the chipset is intel865pe, with onboard sound
it was installed by default i guess.
I fear that is past my (low) level of expertise.
thank you anyway for your time
